actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: Resolution to authorize the voluntary withholding of Maryland, Virginia, and District of Columbia income taxes in the case of Members of the House of Representatives and certain legislative employees, pursuant to agreements subject to review by the Committee on House Administration.

summary.text: Authorizes the voluntary withholding of Maryland, Virginia, and District of Columbia income taxes in the case of Members of the House of Representatives and legislative employees of the House and employees of the Architect of the Capitol and the U.S. Botantic Garden pursuant to agreements subject to review by the Committee on House Administration of the House of Representatives.

titles.title: Resolution to authorize the voluntary withholding of Maryland, Virginia, and District of Columbia income taxes in the case of Members of the House of Representatives and certain legislative employees, pursuant to agreements subject to review by the Committee on House Administration.
